articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: 'I saw myself.' Asian business owners are scared and wary after Atlanta spa shootings
articles.description: The escalating spate of attacks against Asian Americans is no longer just a worrying trend, community leaders say, but could potentially spiral into a dangerous crisis.
articles.content:
If one person can lash out at an Asian business, what's to stop someone else from doing it?"
Charles Yoon, president of the Korean American Association of Greater New York

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Peloton warns owners to keep kids away from their treadmills after a child dies
articles.description: Peloton is warning owners to keep their children away from their treadmills after an accident involving its Tread+ in which a child died.

articles.title: Covid-19 cases rising in US as variants spread
articles.description: 17 states are reporting a rise in coronavirus cases as officials are racing to vaccinate individuals.  CNN's Adrienne Broaddus reports.

articles.title: Australia's wildfires released as much smoke as a massive volcanic eruption, study finds
articles.description: Australia's devastating recent wildfires thrust as much smoke into the Earth's atmosphere as a powerful volcanic eruption, causing cooling over the region's oceans with potentially long-lasting impacts, according to the authors of a new study.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Hear the Perseverance rover's wheels crunch across the Martian surface
articles.description: The Perseverance rover has returned audio of itself driving across the Martian surface. As the rover's six metal wheels move across Mars, the sound of rattling, pinging, banging and crunching can be heard.

articles.title: Taiwan urges citizens not to change their name to 'salmon' to get free sushi
articles.description: Sushi is a favorite meal for many people around the world, but some residents in Taiwan are going to extraordinary lengths to get their hands on it for free -- by officially renaming themselves "salmon" to take advantage of a restaurant promotion.

articles.title: Lawmaker fires back over Republican's hearing comments
articles.description: Rep. Grace Meng (D-NY) fires back at Rep. Chip Roy (R-TX) after comments Roy made during a House Judiciary hearing on Asian American discrimination.

articles.author: Ariella Phillips, CNN
articles.title: Biden orders flags to be flown at half-staff in honor of Atlanta shooting victims
articles.description: President Joe Biden has ordered the American flags at the White House and on other federal ground be flown at half-staff as "a mark of respect for the victims of the senseless acts of violence" in Atlanta this week.

articles.title: It's been a year. Here's what your home office should look like

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Celebs were championing #StopAsianHate well before Atlanta shootings
articles.description: Well before the shootings at three Atlanta-area spas which left eight people dead, some in Hollywood were sounding the alarm about violence in the US targeting Asians and Asian Americans.

articles.author: Maria Morava and Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: A man is found guilty of keeping live sharks in his pool and offering them for sale online
articles.description: Joshua Seguine, 40, was sentenced to a conditional discharge in the Town of LaGrange Justice Court in New York, facing a $5,000 fine for the illegal possession with intent to sell seven sandbar sharks.
